participant_2.background:
My family is the most important thing in my life.
my parents have been married for 40 years.
i am fascinated with ghosts.
i drink beers and go to the creek.
I enjoy strong female characters in my movies.

content.text: Hey, it's nice to meet you!
Hey, nice to meet you too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my pets, read pet training blogs and websites, and go hiking.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to spend time with my family, go to the creek, and drink beers.
Wow, sounds like we have a lot in common! I love spending time with my family too. What is your favorite thing about your family?

My favorite thing about my family is that they are always there for me. My parents have been married for 40 years and they are still going strong. They have always been a great example of what a loving and supportive relationship is.
That's great! I'm glad you have such a great family. My family is also very close. I have two younger siblings and we are always there for each other.
That's awesome! I'm sure your siblings are lucky to have you.
Thanks! I think they are pretty lucky to have me too!
Haha, I'm sure they are!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the creek and drink beers. I also like to go hiking and camping.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been camping before, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's really fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
So, what are some of your favorite movies?
I love movies with strong female characters. I also like movies that are funny and heartwarming.
I love movies with strong female characters too! I also like movies that are suspenseful and scary.
Those are great! I love a good suspenseful movie.
Me too!
So, what are some of your favorite movies?
I love the movie "The Girl on the Train." It's a suspenseful thriller with a strong female lead. I also love the movie "The Princess Bride." It's a heartwarming comedy with a great cast.
Those sound like great movies! I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're both really good.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
